00039 /* Calculates gradient reduction factor using a recursive pyramid */
00040 void gradient_pyramid(TFrame *input, float **phi, FILTER *filter, int maxlevels, int reduce)
00041 {
00042   TFrame frame_small; /* Reduce size frame */
00043   float **phi_small;
00044   int width, height;
00045   
00046   /* Calculate size of reduced frame */
00047   
00048   /* Allocate memory */
00049   phi_small = float_array(width, height);
00050   frame_small.data = float_array(width, height);
00051   frame_small.width = width;
00052   frame_small.height = height;
00053   frame_small.allocated = 1;
00054 
00055   /* Smooth using filter, reduce to smaller size */
00056 
00057   /* Send to next level */
00058   gradient_pyramid(&frame_small, phi_small, filter, maxlevels-1, reduce);
00059   
00060   /* Interpolate phi_small onto phi */
00061 
00062   /* Calculate derivative of frame */
00063 
00064   /* Calculate phi */
00065 }

00068 /* Gradient calculation */
00069 void calc_gradient(TFrame *input, float **x, float **y)
00070 {
00071   int i, j;
00072 
00073   for(i=1;i<(input->width-1);i++) {
00074     for(j=1;j<(input->height-1);j++) {
00075       x[i][j] = input->data[i+1][j] - input->data[i-1][j];
00076       y[i][j] = input->data[i][j+1] - input->data[i][j-1];
00077     }
00078   }
00079   
00080   for(i=0;i<input->width;i++) {
00081     x[i][0] = 0.0;
00082     y[i][0] = 0.0;
00083     x[i][input->height-1] = 0.0;
00084     y[i][input->height-1] = 0.0;
00085   }
00086   
00087   for(j=0;j<input->height;j++) {
00088     x[0][j] = 0.0;
00089     y[0][j] = 0.0;
00090     x[input->width-1][j] = 0.0;
00091     y[input->width-1][j] = 0.0;
00092   }
00093 }
